sentences.sentence: All forms of albinism cause problems with the development and function of the eyes.
sentences.translation: 所有类型的白化病都会在眼睛的发育和功能上引发问题。

sentences.sentence: In this gallery, we look at various examples of albinism in the animal kingdom.
